Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Dermal administration of S - 23121 at 800 mg / kg resulted in an increased incidence of embryonic death and ventricular septal defect , but retarded fetal growth was not observed as it was following oral exposure to S - 23121 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Embryonic death: This is a condition where an embryo fails to develop or dies before birth. It can be considered a disease or condition affecting the developing embryo.
2. Ventricular septal defect: This is a type of heart defect where there is a hole in the wall (septum) separating the two lower chambers of the heart (ventricles). It can lead to various health issues and is considered a disease or condition.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Embryonic death |
| Ventricular septal defect |
